post.summary: DSS Apply Layout to Documents of a Package
post.description:
This API enables applications to apply a single layout to all the documents of a package. The API is provisioned as a RESTful service and uses JSON as the data interchange format. You can use the example JSON from here as input body payload: 
 https://gsa.github.io/DSSAPIDocumentation/api-docs/console/applyLayoutExample.json 
 
 
 To find more info about the various errors and messages in DSS API's, read: 
 https://gsa.github.io/DSSAPIDocumentation/api-docs/createPackageErrors.html

ID.description: Generated unique identifier for te package.
